briefTitle: Frozen ProQuad Administered Concomitantly Versus Nonconcomitantly With Other Pediatric Vaccines

interventionNames: Biological: Measles, Mumps, Rubella and Varicella (Oka-Merck) Virus Vaccine Live
Biological: Measles, Mumps, Rubella and Varicella (Oka-Merck) Virus Vaccine Live

interventions.name: Measles, Mumps, Rubella and Varicella (Oka-Merck) Virus Vaccine Live

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* In good health
* Negative clinical history of varicella, zoster, measles, mumps, rubella, diptheria, tetanus, pertussis, invasive Hib disease and hepatitis B
* Had completed either a 2-dose primary series of PedvaxHIB or COMVAX or any 3-dose primary series of a licensed Hib vaccine
* Had received 2 or 3 doses of any hepatitis B vaccine or COMVAX prior to entry into trial

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous receipt of measles, mumps, rubella or varicella vaccine either alone or in combination
* Any immune impairment or deficiency
* Recent household, daycare or school exposure to invasive Hib disease or hepatitis B
* Exposure to measles, mumps, rubella, varicella, or zoster in the 4 weeks prior to vaccination
* Vaccination with an inactive vaccine with in the past 14 days
* Vaccination with a live vaccine within the past 30 days
* Receipt of immune globulin, blood transfusion or blood-derived product in the past 3 months
* Recent history of fever or underlying medical problems

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postvaccination Measles Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (ELISA) Antibody Titer ≥120 mIU/mL
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody Response to Measles at 6 Weeks Postvaccination for Participants Initially Seronegative (a titer \<120 mIU/mL) to Measles at Baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postvaccination Mumps ELISA Antibody Titer ≥10 Ab Units/mL
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody Response to Mumps at 6 Weeks Postvaccination for Participants Initially Seronegative (a titer \<10 Ab units/mL) to Mumps at Baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postvaccination Rubella ELISA Antibody Titer ≥10 IU/mL
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody Response to Rubella at 6 Weeks Postvaccination for Participants Initially Seronegative (a titer \<10 IU/mL) to Rubella at Baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postvaccination Varicella-Zoster Virus (VZV) Glycoprotein Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay (gpELISA) Antibody Titer ≥5 gpELISA Units/mL
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody Response to Varicella-Zoster Virus (VZV) at 6 Weeks Postvaccination for Participants Initially Seronegative (a titer \<0.6 gpELISA units/mL) to VZV at Baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postvaccination Diphtheria Vero Cell Culture Assay Antibody Titer ≥0.1 IU/mL
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody response to Diphtheria at 6 weeks postvaccination

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postvaccination Tetanus Enzyme Immunoassay (EIA) Antibody Titer ≥0.1 IU/mL
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody response to Tetanus (tetanus antitoxin were measured with an indirect, noncompetitive enzyme immunoassay (EIA)) at 6 weeks postvaccination.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With ≥4-fold Rise in Pertussis Toxin (PT) EIA Antibody Titer
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody response to Pertussis Toxin (titers of pertussis toxin antibodies were measured with an indirect, noncompetitive EIA).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With ≥4-fold Rise in Pertussis Filamentous Hemagglutinin (FHA) EIA Antibody Titer
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody response to pertussis FHA(titers of pertussis filamentous hemagglutinin antibodies were measured with an indirect, noncompetitive EIA).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postvaccination Hepatitis B (Quantitative AUSAB™ Radioimmunoassay (RIA)) Antibody Titer ≥10 mIU/mL
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody response to Hepatitis B (titers measured using the Quantitative AUSAB™ radioimmunoassay (RIA)).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postvaccination Haemophilus Influenzae Type B (Hib) Radioimmunoassay (RIA) Antibody Titer ≥ 1 mcg/mL
outcomeMeasures.description: Antibody response to Haemophilus influenzae type B (Hib). (Anti-polyribosylribitol phosphate (PRP) was measured by radioimmunoassay (RIA) using radiolabeled-PRP according to a standard Farr technique and with a standard provided by the U.S. FDA.)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Measles at 6 Weeks Postvaccination for Participants Initially Seronegative to Measles at Baseline - Geometric Mean Titer (GMT)
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination Observed Geometric Mean Titer of Antibody to Measles. (Titers measured using Measles ELISA.)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Mumps at 6 Weeks Postvaccination for Participants Initially Seronegative to Mumps at Baseline - GMT
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination observed GMT of antibody to mumps. (Titers measured using mumps ELISA.)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Rubella at 6 Weeks Postvaccination for Participants Initially Seronegative to Rubella at Baseline - GMT
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination Observed Geometric Mean Titer of Antibody to Rubella. (Titers measured using Rubella ELISA.)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Varicella at 6 Weeks Postvaccination for Participants Initially Seronegative to Varicella at Baseline - GMT
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination Observed Geometric Mean Titer of Antibody to Varicella. (Titers measured using VZV gpELISA.)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Diphtheria at 6 Weeks Postvaccination - GMT
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination Observed Geometric Mean Titer of Antibody to Diphtheria. (Titers measured using Vero Cell Culture Assay.)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Pertussis Toxin (PT) at 6 Weeks Postvaccination - GMT
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination Observed Geometric Mean Titer of Antibody to Pertussis Toxin (PT). Titers measured using an indirect, noncompetitive Pertussis enzyme immunoassay (EIA).

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Pertussis Filamentous Hemagglutinin (FHA) at 6 Weeks Postvaccination - GMT
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination Observed Geometric Mean Titer of Antibody to Pertussis Filamentous Hemagglutinin (FHA). (Titers measured using an indirect, noncompetitive Pertussis enzyme immunoassay (EIA).)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Hepatitis B at 6 Weeks Postvaccination - GMT
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination Observed Geometric Mean Titer of Antibody to Hepatitis B. (Titers measured using the Quantitative AUSAB™ radioimmunoassay (RIA).)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Haemophilus Influenzae Type B (Hib) at 6 Weeks Postvaccination - GMT
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination observed GMT of antibody to Hib. (Anti-polyribosylribitol phosphate (PRP) was measured by RIA using radiolabeled-PRP according to a standard Farr technique and with a standard provided by the U.S. FDA.)

outcomeMeasures.title: Antibody Response to Tetanus at 6 Weeks Postvaccination - GMT
outcomeMeasures.description: Postvaccination Observed Geometric Mean Titer of Antibody to Tetanus. (Titers of tetanus antitoxin were measured with an indirect, noncompetitive enzyme immunoassay (EIA).)
